events.message: We have received the application from John Doe for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering for the Software Developer role as per the job description keywords.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage John Doeâ€™s application and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Completed the initial phone screening with John Doe. He demonstrated strong knowledge in software development principles.
John responded promptly to our interview invitation and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
Scheduled technical interview with John for May 10th. The session will focus on backend development and system design.
John completed the technical interview with excellent performance, showing strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
The HR interview with John has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss company fit and benefits.
John attended the HR interview and expressed strong enthusiasm about the company culture and role expectations.
We have extended a formal offer to John Doe with competitive salary and benefits based on the interviews conducted.
John provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed interest in joining the team.
John formally accepted the offer and we are moving forward with onboarding preparations.
The onboarding process has started and John has been added to the internal systems and assigned an onboarding mentor.
The hiring process for John Doe is now complete. He has successfully joined the engineering team.
